page.title: 15RUTHERFORD CHURCH
page.content: Rutherford Church,situated in the Rosemount area has recently undergone quite a transformation.The new minister,Reverend David Graham had the church renovated and has used his imagination to try and encourage people back to the church.The church itself is used for games and actives during the weekas well as for regular church sevices.There is now a daily coffee shop and bookstall run by volunteers which has become an important social meeting place for local old people.The Saturday morning markets have also become very popular A'Speak Easy' booth,part of Aberdeen Cable T.V.,is availablefor public use.One of its prime functions is to provide a media outlet for community groups and also individuals who feel strongly about some liocal issues.
